quiz.question: Which year did the Spanish Armada attempt to invade England?
In what year did the English Bill of Rights become law, shaping constitutional monarchy?
Which year did the Zanj Rebellion, a major slave uprising in Basra, begin?
What year did the Roman Empire traditionally fall with the deposition of Romulus Augustulus?
What year did the Meiji Restoration begin transforming Japan into a modern state?
Which year did the Anglo-Zanzibar War occur, often cited as the shortest war in history?
Which year did the Suez Canal open, transforming global trade routes?
In which year did the Bolsheviks sign the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk, exiting World War I?
In what year did the First Crusade's avenue of pilgrimage and military campaigns formally begin with Pope Urban II's call?
What year marks the beginning of the Renaissance often used by historians (fall of Constantinople)?
When did the Spanish Civil War begin, a precursor to broader European conflicts?
When did Charlemagne get crowned Emperor by the Pope, reviving the Roman imperial title in the West?
What year did the Protestant English king Henry VIII break with Rome establishing the Church of England?
When did the Chinese Communist Party proclaim the People's Republic of China?
In what year did Constantine I issue the first civil recognition of Christianity in the Roman Empire?
